item.description: One of the country's most prominent hubs for Venezuelan immigrants is poised to sign an agreement with U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE).

item.title: 4 things to know about the young conservative anti-crime president of Ecuador who was just re-elected
item.description: Ecuador re-elected President Daniel Noboa to a four-year term. What to know about the pro-President Donald Trump conservative taking on cartel violenc...

item.title: Educators hope 'abysmal' national literacy rates will be addressed now that DEI, gender ideology out the door
item.description: ThevTexas-based campaign At Grade Level is urging parents to ask their kids to read out loud to them to raise awareness about low literacy rates.

item.title: 'Hateful and horrific': Shapiro governor's mansion fire prompts outcry from lawmakers
item.description: Republicans and Democrats were quick to unite over the weekend after Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro's home was set ablaze by an alleged arsonist.

item.title: 'Rules for thee': Senate DOGE leader seeks crackdown on tax-dodging government workers
item.description: Sen. Joni Ernst, R-Iowa, will introduce a bill to crack down on federal employees who have not paid their taxes.
